Laser cut machine

The second section started with a brainstorm for the final project of the course.

One of the ideas was to design a synchronized music and lights system, possiblying change the color of the lights depending of the melody that is playing.

The section moved on to introduce the laser cut machine and its hystory. Details about particularities of materials and shapes that the laser cut can do were provided. A brief introduction of inkscape (vector image editor) software to model the images used by the laser cut were explained.

Maintained by Cristiano Lemes
